Store dotfiles in git repositoryhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/store-dotfiles-in-git/Fri, 10 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/store-dotfiles-in-git/Content hacked with mods from Atlassian Setup: git init --bare $HOME/.dotfiles alias dotfiles='/usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME' dotfiles config --local status.showUntrackedFiles no echo "alias dotfiles='/usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME'" >> $HOME/.bashrc Add: config status config add .vimrc config commit -m "Add vimrc" config add .bashrc config commit -m "Add bashrc" Remote (change to actual ssh): git remote add origin https://someRandomFatGuy@bitbucket.org/someRandomFatGuy/dotfiles.git Push: git push Clone: git clone --bare https://someRandomFatGuy@bitbucket.org/someRandomFatGuy/dotfiles.git $HOME/.dotfiles function dotfiles { /usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.
